title: News Roundtable: From Immigration To Israel/Gaza Crisis
teaser: Bloomberg News' Margaret Talev and the BBC's Paul Danahar join us for a look at this week's key news stories.
contentencoded:
As President Barack Obama meets with Central American leaders at the White House today to discuss the influx of young immigrants from their countries to the U.S., Here & Now looks at the week’s news, including immigration and the conflict between Israel and Hamas.

Margaret Talev, White House correspondent forÂ Bloomberg News, and Paul Danahar, Washington bureau chief for the BBC, join hosts Meghna Chakrabarti and Jeremy Hobson.

Guests

  • Margaret Talev, White House correspondent for Bloomberg News. She tweets @margarettalev.
  • Paul Danahar, Washington bureau chief for the BBC. He tweets @pdanahar.
